00031 //----------------------------------------------------------
00032 GrMaterial::GrMaterial( const tstring& name, const SInfo& matInfo )
00033 : _name( name )
00034 , _deformers( matInfo.deformers )
00035 , _passes( matInfo.passes )
00036 , _passCount( matInfo.passCount )
00037 , _postProcessPassCount( matInfo.postProcessPassCount )
00038 , _postProcessPasses( matInfo.postProcessPasses )
00039 , _sortType( matInfo.sortType )
00040 , _castShadow( matInfo.castShadow )
00041 , _receiveShadow( matInfo.receiveShadow )
00042 , _stipple( matInfo.stipple )
00043 {
00044         UPath temp( name );
00045 
00047         _shortName = temp.GetPathString();
00048         size_t pos = _shortName.find_first_of( '/' );
00049         if ( pos != tstring::npos )
00050                 _shortName = _shortName.substr( pos + 1 );              
00051 
00053         pos = _shortName.find_first_of( '/' );
00054         tstring package = _shortName.substr( 0, pos );
00055 
00057         pos = _shortName.find_last_of( '/' );
00058         if ( pos != tstring::npos && pos < ( _shortName.length() - 1 ) )
00059                 _shortName = package + "\n" + _shortName.substr( pos + 1 );
00060 }

00074 //----------------------------------------------------------
00075 void
00076 GrMaterial::Rebuild( const SInfo& matInfo )
00077 {
00078         Clean();
00079         _deformers = matInfo.deformers;
00080         _passes = matInfo.passes;
00081         _passCount = matInfo.passCount;
00082         _postProcessPasses = matInfo.postProcessPasses;
00083         _postProcessPassCount = matInfo.postProcessPassCount;
00084         _sortType = matInfo.sortType;
00085         _castShadow = matInfo.castShadow;
00086         _receiveShadow = matInfo.receiveShadow;
00087         _stipple = matInfo.stipple;
00088 }

00090 //----------------------------------------------------------
00091 void
00092 GrMaterial::AddPass( SMaterialPassInfo& passInfo )
00093 {
00095         GrMaterialPass* newPass = new GrMaterialPass( _passCount, passInfo );
00096 
00098         GrMaterialPass** newPassArray = new GrMaterialPass* [ _passCount+1 ];
00099         memcpy( newPassArray, _passes, _passCount * sizeof( GrMaterialPass* ) );
00100         delete[] _passes;
00101 
00103         newPassArray[ _passCount++ ] = newPass;
00104         _passes = newPassArray;
00105 }

00107 //----------------------------------------------------------
00108 void
00109 GrMaterial::AddPostProcessPass( SMaterialPassInfo& passInfo )
00110 {
00112         GrMaterialPass* newPass = new GrMaterialPass( _postProcessPassCount, passInfo );
00113 
00115         GrMaterialPass** newPassArray = new GrMaterialPass* [ _postProcessPassCount+1 ];
00116         memcpy( newPassArray, _postProcessPasses, _postProcessPassCount * sizeof( GrMaterialPass* ) );
00117         delete[] _postProcessPasses;
00118 
00120         newPassArray[ _postProcessPassCount++ ] = newPass;
00121         _postProcessPasses = newPassArray;
00122 }

00124 //----------------------------------------------------------
00125 void
00126 GrMaterial::DeletePass( unsigned int passIdx )
00127 {
00128         B_ASSERT( passIdx < _passCount );
00129 
00130         delete _passes[ passIdx ];
00131         memmove( _passes + passIdx, _passes + passIdx + 1,
00132                 ( _passCount - passIdx - 1 ) * sizeof( GrMaterialPass* ) );
00133         --_passCount;
00134 }
00135 
00136 //----------------------------------------------------------
00137 void
00138 GrMaterial::DeletePostProcessPass( unsigned int passIdx )
00139 {
00140         B_ASSERT( passIdx < _postProcessPassCount );
00141 
00142         delete _postProcessPasses[ passIdx ];
00143         memmove( _postProcessPasses + passIdx, _postProcessPasses + passIdx + 1,
00144                 ( _postProcessPassCount - passIdx - 1 ) * sizeof( GrMaterialPass* ) );
00145         --_postProcessPassCount;
00146 }

00151 {
00152         return Clone( _name );

00155 //----------------------------------------------------------
00156 URef< GrMaterial >
00157 GrMaterial::Clone( const tstring& name ) const
00158 {
00160         SInfo matInfo;
00161         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _deformers.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00162                 matInfo.deformers.Push( _deformers[ i ]->Clone() );
00163 
00164         matInfo.passCount = _passCount;
00165         matInfo.passes = new GrMaterialPass*[ _passCount ];
00166         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _passCount; ++i )
00167                 matInfo.passes[ i ] = _passes[ i ]->Clone();
00168 
00169         matInfo.postProcessPassCount = _postProcessPassCount;
00170         matInfo.postProcessPasses = new GrMaterialPass*[ _postProcessPassCount ];
00171         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _postProcessPassCount; ++i )
00172                 matInfo.postProcessPasses[ i ] = _postProcessPasses[ i ]->Clone();
00173 
00174         matInfo.sortType = _sortType;
00175         matInfo.castShadow = _castShadow;
00176         matInfo.receiveShadow = _receiveShadow;
00177         matInfo.stipple = _stipple;
00178 
00180         return gGrMaterialMgr->SetMaterial( name, matInfo );
00181 }

00185 GrMaterial::GetPass( unsigned int pass )

00199 //----------------------------------------------------------
00200 GrTextureStage::GenTextureFlag
00201 GrMaterial::GetGenTextureFlags() const
00202 {
00204         unsigned int flags = 0;
00205         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < _passCount; ++pass )
00206                 for ( unsigned int stage = 0; stage < ES_COUNT; ++stage )
00207                         flags |= _passes[ pass ]->GetStage( ( ESTAGE )stage ).GetGenTextureFlag();
00208 
00209         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < _postProcessPassCount; ++pass )
00210                 for ( unsigned int stage = 0; stage < ES_COUNT; ++stage )
00211                         flags |= _postProcessPasses[ pass ]->GetStage( ( ESTAGE )stage ).GetGenTextureFlag();
00212 
00214         return flags;
00215 }

00233 //----------------------------------------------------------
00234 bool
00235 GrMaterial::AlphaTest() const
00236 {
00238         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < _passCount; ++pass )
00239                 if ( !_passes[ pass ]->AlphaTest() )
00240                         return false;
00241         return true;
00242 }

00244 //----------------------------------------------------------
00245 bool
00246 GrMaterial::CastShadow() const
00247 {
00249         if ( !_castShadow )
00250                 return false;
00251 
00253         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < _passCount; ++pass )
00254                 if ( _passes[ pass ]->CastShadow() )
00255                         return true;
00256         return false;
00257 }
00258 
00259 //----------------------------------------------------------
00260 bool
00261 GrMaterial::ReceiveShadow() const
00262 {
00264         if ( !_receiveShadow )
00265                 return false;
00266 
00268         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < _passCount; ++pass )
00269                 if ( _passes[ pass ]->ReceiveShadow() )
00270                         return true;
00271         return false;
00272 }

00274 //----------------------------------------------------------
00275 void
00276 GrMaterial::Update()
00277 {
00279         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < _passCount; ++pass )
00280                 _passes[ pass ]->Update();
00281 }

00288 //----------------------------------------------------------
00289 void
00290 GrMaterial::Clean()
00291 {
00292         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _passCount; ++i )
00293                 delete _passes[ i ];
00294 
00295         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _postProcessPassCount; ++i )
00296                 delete _postProcessPasses[ i ];
00297 
00298         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _deformers.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00299                 delete _deformers[ i ];
00300 
00301         _deformers.Clear();
00302 
00303         delete[] _passes;
00304         _passes = 0;
00305 
00306         delete[] _postProcessPasses;
00307         _postProcessPasses = 0;
00308 }
